title: Watashi no Joushi
sinopse:
Mano just started a new job, but her first day she meets a demon of a man. And to find out that same man is also her new boss what horrible luck! But is he truly a Demon Boss or is he really kind?

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Watashi no Hanashi
Volume 8: Kanojo ni Rusuban wa Makaserarenai
